description: These are independent reviews, general project updates and papers to the Mayor on Crossrail and the Elizabeth line.

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["These are independent reviews, general project updates and papers to the Mayor on Crossrail and the Elizabeth line. Appropriate redactions have been applied where necessary in line with FOI requirements."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}

{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"KPMG reviews"}

In September 2018, the joint sponsors of the Crossrail project - TfL and the Department for Transport (DfT) - commissioned independent reviews into Crossrail Limited's governance and financial and commercial arrangements. Sponsors also requested an independent review to record the key events and decisions made prior to the announcement of the schedule delay by Crossrail Limited in August 2018.
